homePage.title: Hi, I'm Laurence. Welcome to my portfolio website.
homePage.summary: I'm a bilingual software engineer with knowledge and skills extending into areas such as business analysis and system administration.
homePage.work: I also have customer-facing experience in Japanese engaging in requirements workshops, conducting product training, and providing technical support.
homePage.skills: I take pride in my ability to learn new concepts and apply new skills quickly, process tasks efficiently while maintaining accuracy, and prevent rework by being thorough and doing the necessary due diligence upfront.
homePage.education: I hold a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science and I have also graduated from an advanced agile software engineering bootcamp.
homePage.contact: If you're interested in connecting, please reach out to me on LinkedIn.

notFoundPage.404: Is this what you were looking for...?

projectData.title: Personal Website
projectData.summary: This portfolio website (which you are currently viewing)
contributions: Implemented the entire website using React, TypeScript, and CSS
Manually translated all content into Japanese and made website multi-lingual using i18next

projectData.title: Mugi
projectData.summary: A multi-lingual, mobile-friendly full-stack web application for seeking and providing pet-sitting services within Japan
projectData.stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Python, FastAPI, Tortoise ORM, PostgreSQL, Firebase
contributions: Designed the schema and seeded the PostgreSQL database
Implemented the back-end using Python, FastAPI, and Tortoise ORM
Deployed the application’s front-end, back-end, and database on Render
Resolved defects and added functionality to the front-end using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS

projectData.title: VidCat
projectData.summary: A full-stack web application that leverages RAWG API to keep track of your collection of video games and consoles, as well as the ones you want
projectData.stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express.js, Knex.js, PostgreSQL
contributions: Designed the schema and seeded the PostgreSQL database using RAWG API
Implemented the back-end using Node.js, Express.js, and Knex.js
Deployed the application’s front-end, back-end, and database on Render
Implemented the front-end using React, TypeScript, and CSS

projectData.title: CodeTutor
projectData.summary: A full-stack web application that leverages OpenAI’s ChatGPT to help users learn to code without directly revealing solutions.
projectData.stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express.js, Knex.js, PostgreSQL
contributions: Implemented the back-end using Node, Express, and Knex to follow REST best practices
Deployed the application’s front-end, back-end, and database on Render
Identified and resolved functional defects in the front-end using React and TypeScript
Managed the project schedule, task assignment, and resource load

japaneseCertificationData.summary: The highest level of a Japanese test modeled after the JLPT

technicalCertificationData.title: A+
technicalCertificationData.summary: Two exams covering hardware, operating systems, software, networking, troubleshooting, security, mobile devices, virtualization & cloud computing, and operational procedures

technicalCertificationData.summary: An exam covering general security concepts, threats, vulnerabilities & mitigations, security architecutre, security operations, and security program management & oversight

technicalCertificationData.title: ITIL 4 Foundation
technicalCertificationData.summary: An exam covering an end-to-end operating model for the creation, delivery and continual improvement of technology-enabled products and services

technicalCertificationData.title: Network+
technicalCertificationData.summary: An exam covering networking concepts, network implementations, network operations, network security, and network troubleshooting

technicalCertificationData.title: Server+
technicalCertificationData.summary: An exam covering server hardware installation & management, server administration, security & disaster recovery, and troubleshooting

technicalCertificationData.title: Project+
technicalCertificationData.summary: An exam covering project management basics, project constraints, communication & change management, and project tools & documention

technicalCertificationData.title: Cloud+
technicalCertificationData.summary: An exam covering cloud architecutre, deployment, operations, security, DevOps fundamentals, and troubleshooting

technicalCertificationData.title: Information Security Management Examination
technicalCertificationData.summary: Two Japanese national exams covering information security management concepts

technicalCertificationData.title: Information Technology Passport Examination
technicalCertificationData.summary: A Japanese national exam covering the foundations of IT terminology and concepts

technicalCertificationData.title: Fundamental Information Technology Engineer Examination
technicalCertificationData.summary: Two Japanese national exams covering core engineering concepts

technicalCertificationData.title: Professional Scrum Master I

technicalCertificationData.title: Professional Scrum Product Owner I
